title: Little Lamb
description: Police Procedural: Harriet Vaughn returns to active duty after absence on compassionate leave. She's handed the cold case of the unsolved murder of a child beauty pageant queen.She uncovers layers of deception and the possible involvement of Grimes, a killer now in a psychiatric institution.She is hampered by jealousy and treachery even in her own policy force, as well as her own demons.
author: Jeca Campion
